text: I you know I I think I lost count I
think we have 16 17 18 percussionists
and we have two different stage bands
about 110 players it's not it's not

orchestra of this of this proportion
the requirements of this particular work
is not typical to any opera so already
you're you're breaking all the rules and
going over every boundary
the Germans called a rostrum it's
basically a wagon that carries a
thousand people in the audience down the
length of the runway
so we're basically moving a quarter
million pounds down two hundred feet of
track and back the majority of this

first time I've done something like this
I've had a few audience members on

or this elaborate
it's just learning it to coordinate all

you're performing in a very strange

think the answer is yes that it does
